name: Wooden Block Puzzle Extreme
description:
WOODEN BLOCK PUZZLE EXTREME: ALL FEATURES YOU WISH FOR
Being one of the most popular puzzle genre in the world, WOODEN BLOCK PUZZLE EXTREME comes packed full of features for every block puzzle lover. Furthermore, it’s such a harmony of Wood, Brick and Zen styles to make you relax after a long day.

WOODEN BLOCK PUZZLE EXTREME is just pure fun! The gameplay is so simple, it won't take you more than a minute to learn, but it will take you days or weeks to master.

Studies show that this kind of puzzle is proven to release dopamine which relaxes your brain, reduce stress and much more. A brain that is active and stimulated by puzzles is a brain that will function well at work. Your thinking will be more clear and much faster than it was.

WOODEN BLOCK PUZZLE FEATURES

◉ Free, simple and fun puzzle that keeps your brain sharp and boost memory
◉ Easy to play, hard to master with mastery multi-levels
◉ Able to rotate and undo blocks
◉ Able to utilize in-game hammer to keep playing and beat new high score
◉ Available for 4 Modes: Classic, Time, Bomb, Plus
◉ Able to keep track on your progress and achievements weekly/monthly/yearly through Profile section
◉ Exclusive Leader board access for Global/Local/Friends Ranking
◉ Facebook Login to sync and save your progress
◉ Help you spend quality time anywhere you go

Doesn’t it feel fantastic when you complete a puzzle? Come play WOODEN BLOCK PUZZLE EXTREME and share this brilliant block puzzle game with your family to have fun together.
